comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

I'm unable to print off the webpage I linked above because pages 2-5 are overlaid by a sidebar that appears to the right of the page's content.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. navigate to this webpage: http://lifehacker.com/#!5791208/run-your-home-network-like-a-coffee-shop
2. run print-preview or try to print off the page
3. observe how pages 2-5 are overlaid by the sidebar (and hence the content is not viewable)
Actual Results:  
page's content is overlaid and not viewable when printed

Expected Results:  
I expected to be able to see the content on the print out the same as I could see it on the webpage.

Both Internet Explorer 8 and Chrome printed the webpage without any problems.
comments.creator: nrundy@hotmail.com
